name: Freebot : Battle for FreeWeb
description: Freebot: Battle for FreeWeb is a frenzied third-person game where you have to be fast to dodge enemy shots. Fight for the free web !
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Intel I3 or Amd FX-6350 or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD R9 270 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Intel I5 or Amd FX-8350 Or Better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 TI or AMD R9 280X or Better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
